REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2078 reute d f BC-ALLTEL-<AT>-GETS-PERM 06-01 0055

TEXT.TITLE: ALLTEL <AT> GETS PERMISSION FOR LICENSE TRANSFER
TEXT.BODY: ALLTEL Corp said it has received permission from the Federal Communications Commission for the transfer of its Syracuse/Binghamton/Cortland, N.Y., radio paging licenses to Mobile Communications Corp of America <MCCABV.O> and the transfer takes effect today. Reuter
